entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
